definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (Palm. [[ידיבעל]] DHM in MV:10, 983 cf. Sab. n.pr. with [[ידע]] DHM:ZMG 1875, 612)—
a Benjamite 1Ch 7:6, 1Ch 7:10, 1Ch 7:11, LXX Adeihl, Iedihl, etc.
one of David's heroes acc. to 1Ch 11:45 appar. = the Manassite captain of 1Ch 12:21 (Baer; van d. H v:1Ch 11:20), LXX Elqeihl, Iedihl.
a Korahite porter 1Ch 26:2 LXX Iderhl, Iedihl.
